note.p: Career: Apprenticed to the linen business (1820); took a four-month tour on the continent (1826); Vice-President Belfast Natural History Society (1833); President of Belfast Literary Society (1837-1839); voyaged to the Levant with Edward Forbes (FRS 1845) (1841); President of Belfast Natural History and Philosophical Society (1843-1952)
Memberships: Natural History and Philosophical Society of Belfast (1826; President 1843)
Authority: Death date of February from DNB
